cgcloud__Sales_Organization_User__c.name: cgcloud__Sales_Organization_User__c
cgcloud__Sales_Organization_User__c.description: This object stores the details of the relationship between a sales organization and a user.

cgcloud__Default_Visit_Template__c.description: Reference to the default visit template.

cgcloud__Is_Tour_Selection_Required__c.description: Indicates whether tour selection is enabled for the user.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Internally used to show the record's hyperlink.

cgcloud__Unique_User_Id__c.description: Used internally. Contains these unique values: User.Id Sales_Organisation.Id

cgcloud__Work_Begins__c.description: Time at which the user begins to work.

cgcloud__Work_Ends__c.description: Time at which the user stops to work.

cgcloud__Works_On_Friday__c.description: Day of the week on which the user typically works. For example, used for capacity planning.

cgcloud__Works_On_Monday__c.description: Day of the week on which the user typically works. For example, used for capacity planning.

cgcloud__Works_On_Saturday__c.description: Day of the week on which the user typically works. For example, used for capacity planning.

cgcloud__Works_On_Sunday__c.description: Day of the week on which the user typically works. For example, used for capacity planning.

cgcloud__Works_On_Thursday__c.description: Day of the week on which the user typically works. For example, used for capacity planning.

cgcloud__Works_On_Tuesday__c.description: Day of the week on which the user typically works. For example, used for capacity planning.

cgcloud__Works_On_Wednesday__c.description: Day of the week on which the user typically works. For example, used for capacity planning.
